Welcome to Triton’s documentation!¶

Features

  • supports circular object frictionless collision
  • supports arbitrary forces and torques on Rigid Bodies
  • uses an accurate Runge Kutta 4 numerical integrator
Author:Stian Lode <stian.lode2@gmail.com>
Source code:github.com project
Bug tracker:github.com issues
Generated:September 27, 2012
License:GPL v2
Version:0.1
